Text: OK be aware that some of you will not work and I am not 100% sure every one is working so don't put bad comments because I will try to fix or get a solution for you as fast as I can !

also I said this as bugs because it is a ported version so I will give you a fix as fast as I can but for the loading screen issue you can actually download the crack or restart stuff.
just put all the bugs on the comments I will fix it one by one.

For language you can download the English crack or you can press the setting try to press all the buttons on settings and if it goes to the language settings press english (it ls like  in the last or so so try that)
Oh I forgot to mention this.... THIS ONLY WORKS FOR NIVIDIA CARDS AND AMD CARDS NOT INTEL !! SO SORRY FOR INTEL USERS !

Same problem, no text when you add the English language packs and change the language.txt

Please be specific with instructions, here's what I attempted.

-Mounted ETW.dmg (by double clicking)
-Dragged program into Applications folder
-Downloaded english language packs
-Moved them into the same folder as the RU language packs
-Opened Language.txt in the same folder and added EN (tried several combinations, added before and after, etc.)
-When I open the game after a long time loading the menus have no text anymore

Even if I change everything back, the text doesn't reappear, not even the Russian

If I don't add the language packs there is text in Russian

Changing resolution made no difference (haven't tried changing any other settings since I can't read the menus)
